class.name: BlipKitBytecode
class.brief_description: A [Resource] used to save byte code generated with [BlipKitAssembler].
class.description:
Can be saved as [code].blipc[/code] files. [b]Example:[/b] Save byte code: [codeblocks] [gdscript] # Get byte code from a BlipKitAssembler. var bytecode := assem.get_byte_code()
# Save byte code to a file. ResourceSaver.save(bytecode, "res://bytecode.blipc") [/gdscript] [/codeblocks]

method.name: find_label
method.description: Returns the index of a label with [param name]. Returns [code]-1[/code] if no label with [name] exists.

method.name: get_code_section_offset
method.description: Returns the byte offset of the code section.

method.name: get_code_section_size
method.description: Returns the size in bytes the code section.

method.name: get_error_message
method.description: Returns the error message when loading the byte code fails.

method.name: get_label_name
method.description: Returns the label name for the label with index [param label_index].

method.name: get_label_position
method.description: Returns the byte offset for the label with index [param label_index] relative to the byte code section offset.

method.name: is_valid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the byte code is valid. Returns [code]false[/code] if the byte code is not valid. In this case, [method get_state] returns the state and [method get_error_message] returns the error message.
